articles.description: Jurassic World Dominion, releasing June 10th, has received a new trailer. It stars Chris Pratt and Bryce Dallas Howard, as well as Sam Neill, Laura Dern, and Jeff Goldblum, who are returning for the new entry.

articles.title: 'Dreams do still come true' in a new novel by Dolly Parton and James Patterson - knkx.org
articles.description: Parton didn't just co-write the novel, she also recorded a whole album to go with it. Run, Rose, Run is about an aspiring country singer trying to shake a dark past and make it big in music.
articles.content:
Updated April 29, 2022 at 8:56 AM ET
Dolly Parton hit a trifecta with her latest project Run, Rose, Run it's a thriller, a studio album and will eventually be turned into a movie.

articles.description: The Post takes a look at the iconic career of Willie Nelson in honor of the country singer's 89th birthday.

articles.description: The family of Halyna Hutchins, who died in Alec Baldwin's "Rust" movie shooting, demand that video of her final moments be removed by investigators.
